review: The remote stops responding constantly. When that happens, you have to disconnect the power and reboot and HOPE that the remote will pair again when it restarts. If not, you'd better hope you have a smartphone with the Roku app, because you won't be able to do anything to select "pair remote" under the system settings menu.I've tried everything, including accessing the "secret menu" to update the remote's software. I think I'm going to take it back and try to return it.  Unfortunate.
